info.title: CircleAge API
info.description: API documentation for CircleAge application, providing a range of features designed to promote healthy, independent, and socially connected aging among seniors. This API supports user account management, health appointments, transportation management, event management, fitness management, and social engagement features.

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"

get.description: Get the authenticated user\'s basic profile information

post.description: Send a friend request to the user identified by UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the user to send friend request to

get.description: List all pending friend requests for the authenticated user
List all friends of the authenticated user

patch.description: Accept a friend request identified by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the friend request to accept

patch.description: Reject a friend request by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the friend request to reject

delete.description: Remove a friend by their friend ID

parameters.name: friendId
parameters.description: ID of the friend to remove

delete.description: Withdraw a previously sent friend request by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the friend request to withdraw

get.description: Check if the authenticated user has a match profile
Get the authenticated user\'s match profile

put.description: Update the authenticated user\'s match profile

post.description: Create a new match profile for the authenticated user

get.description: Get potential matches for the authenticated user

post.description: Like a user by their targetUserId

parameters.name: targetUserId
parameters.description: ID of the user to like

post.description: Skip a user by their targetUserId

parameters.name: targetUserId
parameters.description: ID of the user to skip

get.description: Get all conversations for the authenticated user
Get messages for a specific conversation by conversationId

post.description: Send a message in a specific conversation

delete.description: Delete a message by its ID

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: ID of the message to delete

post.description: Get smart reply suggestions based on the input message
